title: BEL Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 15 ITI Apprentice Posts
description: The Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 15 ITI Trade Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th and ITI can apply for the BEL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fe...
